name: Sugardians VS Evil Muffins
description:
The Evil Muffins have opened a space rift to Sugar Kingdom and start eating all the sugar ! With the help of the Green and Blue Sugardians, try and contain the Muffins for at least 100 seconds so that the other Sugardians can close the rift !

Hover the icons on the left for more information on how the mechanics work. When the yellow counter hits 100, you win !

Note: The game will be paused if left in a docked tab, drag the tab out and give it its own window if you want to let the game run in the background.
